name: Cambium Networks Corporation
description: Cambium Networks Corporation is a global provider of wireless broadband solutions, specializing in fixed wireless and Wi-Fi connectivity. Established in 2011 and headquartered in Rolling Meadows, Illinois, Cambium Networks aims to connect underserved and unconnected areas with high-performance, reliable, and scalable wireless network solutions. The company develops a wide array of products including point-to-point and point-to-multipoint systems, as well as enterprise-grade Wi-Fi access points. Cambium's innovative technology enables businesses, schools, and communities to access high-speed internet, facilitating growth and enhancing productivity. With a strong focus on performance and ease of use, Cambium Networks empowers service providers and enterprises with comprehensive, secure, and cost-effective connectivity solutions. The company is dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and support, understanding that effective communication is vital for success in today's digital landscape. Cambium Networks is committed to fostering digital inclusion through its advanced technology, positioning itself as a leader in the wireless broadband industry.

key_executives.name: Scott Imhoff
key_executives.position: Senior Vice President of Product Management

seo.meta_title: Cambium Networks Corporation | Wireless Broadband Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Cambium Networks Corporation, a leader in wireless broadband connectivity. Discover advanced fixed wireless and Wi-Fi solutions designed for a connected world.

faq.question: What does Cambium Networks do?
faq.answer: Cambium Networks provides wireless broadband solutions, including point-to-point and point-to-multipoint systems, as well as Wi-Fi access points.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cambium Networks?
faq.answer: Atul Bhatnagar is the CEO of Cambium Networks Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Cambium Networks headquartered?
faq.answer: Cambium Networks is headquartered in Rolling Meadows, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: What are Cambium Networks' main products?
faq.answer: Cambium Networks' main products include ePMP, PMP, Force 200, cnPilot, and cnMaestro.
